name: MIS  HMIP Education Report
description:
The report is to assist Prisons and HMIP for Inspectorate and Ofsted Inspections.
IOP0010 v1.0 Last Modified: 15/10/2021.

dataset.name: All Prisoners
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, DT_ADMISSION.MOVEMENT_TIME FROM (SELECT ob.offender_id_display, fme.offender_booking_sk, est.establishment_code_nk, fme.to_location_sk, fme.from_location_sk, fme.from_location_type, MAX(fme.MOVEMENT_SEQ) AS MOVEMENT_SEQ, MAX(d.day_date) AS MOVEMENT_TIME, TRUNC(ETL.LOAD_END_DATETIME) AS LOAD_DATE FROM BODIMIS.FACT_MOVEMENT_EXTERNAL fme, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING ob, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT est, BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG ETL, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE d WHERE ob.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = est.ESTABLISHMENT_SK AND d.date_sk = fme.date_sk AND fme.offender_booking_sk = ob.offender_booking_sk AND ob.active_status IN ('Active In', 'Active Out') AND ob.MIS_CURRENT_RECORD_IND = 'Y' AND ob.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' AND ETL.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL) AND ob.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = fme.to_location_sk AND fme.movement_seq = (SELECT MAX(fme2.movement_seq) FROM BODIMIS.FACT_MOVEMENT_EXTERNAL fme2 WHERE fme.offender_booking_sk = fme2.offender_booking_sk AND fme2.direction_code = 'IN' AND fme2.TYPE = 'Admission' AND fme2.To_location_type = 'Establishment' AND fme2.reason_code <> 'R') GROUP BY ob.offender_id_display, fme.offender_booking_sk, est.establishment_code_nk, fme.to_location_sk, fme.from_location_sk, fme.from_location_type, ETL.LOAD_END_DATETIME) DT_ADMISSION, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = DT_ADMISSION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_STATUS = 'O') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MIS_CURRENT_RECORD_IND = 'Y') AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, FIRST_NAME, MOVEMENT_TIME FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Education History
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_EDUCATION_STUDY_AREA.DESCRIPTION, AT_EDUCATION_LEVEL.CODE, AT_EDUCATION_LEVEL.DESCRIPTION AS EDUCATION_LEVEL_DESC, AT_EDUCATION_START_DATE.DAY_DATE, AT_EDUCATION_END_DATE.DAY_DATE AS EDUCATION_END_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_EDUCATION.COMMENT_TEXT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_EDUCATION.SCHOOL_NAME, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_EDUCATION.SPECIAL_EDUCATION_FLAG, AT_EDUCATION_SCHEDULE.DESCRIPTION AS EDUCATION_SCHEDULE_DESC FROM BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_EDUCATION_START_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_EDUCATION_END_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_REFERENCE_CODES AT_EDUCATION_STUDY_AREA, BODIMIS.DIM_REFERENCE_CODES AT_EDUCATION_LEVEL, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_EDUCATION, BODIMIS.DIM_REFERENCE_CODES AT_EDUCATION_SCHEDULE WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_EDUCATION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_EDUCATION.START_DATE_SK = AT_EDUCATION_START_DATE.DATE_SK (+)) AND (BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_EDUCATION.END_DATE_SK = AT_EDUCATION_END_DATE.DATE_SK (+)) AND (BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_EDUCATION.STUDY_AREA_SK = AT_EDUCATION_STUDY_AREA.REFERENCE_CODE_SK) AND (BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_EDUCATION.EDUCATION_LEVEL_SK = AT_EDUCATION_LEVEL.REFERENCE_CODE_SK) AND (BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_EDUCATION.EDUCATION_SCHEDULE = AT_EDUCATION_SCHEDULE.CODE) AND (AT_EDUCATION_SCHEDULE.CODE_DOMAIN = 'EDU_SCHED') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_STATUS = 'O') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MIS_CURRENT_RECORD_IND = 'Y') AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, FIRST_NAME, DESCRIPTION, CODE, EDUCATION_LEVEL_DESC, DAY_DATE, EDUCATION_END_DATE, COMMENT_TEXT, SCHOOL_NAME, SPECIAL_EDUCATION_FLAG, EDUCATION_SCHEDULE_DESC, MOVEMENT_TIME AS V_ADMISSION, 'TBD' AS V_MAX_CONCAT_VUL_ALERT, 'TBD' AS V_MAX_CONCAT_CARE_TYPE, 'TBD' AS V_EDU_START_DATE_FIX, 'TBD' AS V_EDU_END_DATE_FIX FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Care Type
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.TYPE_DESCRIPTION, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.CODE_DESCRIPTION, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.CODE FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.CODE IN ('AA', 'AS', 'ARTH', 'ASTH', 'AUTI', 'BIP', 'HDL', 'DEP', 'DI', 'D', (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), 'FALS', 'HD', 'LD', 'LDY', 'MI', 'ND', 'NR', 'MIMP', 'PC', 'RM', 'SI', 'VI') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_STATUS = 'O') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MIS_CURRENT_RECORD_IND = 'Y') AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND (BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.STATUS = 'ON'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, FIRST_NAME, TYPE_DESCRIPTION, CODE_DESCRIPTION, CODE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Vulnerability Alerts
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_ALERT.ALERT_DESCRIPTION FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_ALERT AT_ALERT, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_ALERT AT_OFFENDER_ALERT WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (AT_ALERT.ALERT_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.ALERT_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (CASE WHEN AT_ALERT.ALERT_ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN AT_ALERT.ALERT_TYPE_NK END = 'V' AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_STATUS = 'O') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MIS_CURRENT_RECORD_IND = 'Y') AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.ALERT_STATUS = 'ACTIVE'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, FIRST_NAME, ALERT_DESCRIPTION FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: $ref:V_MAX_CONCAT_CARE_TYPE
field.display: Additional Learning Needs or No Disability
